description: pre_block_migration() might call self._cache_image, which is refactored away from the driver since change I0d01cb7d2fd67de2565b8d45d34f7846ad4112c2
title: missing _cache_image() in libvirt driver

comments.content: pre_block_migration() might call self._cache_image, which is refactored away from the driver since change I0d01cb7d2fd67de2565b8d45d34f7846ad4112c2

comments.content: This wasn't picked up (among other reasons) because the test coverage for this method is poor -- none of the else block after "if not info['backing_file'] has tests, not the kernel and ram disk fetch.
